00038 /* hash */
00039 
00043 typedef tommy_key_t tommy_hash_t;
00044 
00063 tommy_uint32_t tommy_hash_u32(tommy_uint32_t init_val, const void* void_key, tommy_size_t key_len);
00064 
00083 tommy_uint64_t tommy_hash_u64(tommy_uint64_t init_val, const void* void_key, tommy_size_t key_len);
00084 
00101 tommy_uint32_t tommy_strhash_u32(tommy_uint64_t init_val, const void* void_key);
00102 
00108 tommy_inline tommy_uint32_t tommy_inthash_u32(tommy_uint32_t key)
00109 {
00110         key -= key << 6;
00111         key ^= key >> 17;
00112         key -= key << 9;
00113         key ^= key << 4;
00114         key -= key << 3;
00115         key ^= key << 10;
00116         key ^= key >> 15;
00117 
00118         return key;
00119 }
00120 
00126 tommy_inline tommy_uint64_t tommy_inthash_u64(tommy_uint64_t key)
00127 {
00128         key = ~key + (key << 21);
00129         key = key ^ (key >> 24);
00130         key = key + (key << 3) + (key << 8);
00131         key = key ^ (key >> 14);
00132         key = key + (key << 2) + (key << 4);
00133         key = key ^ (key >> 28);
00134         key = key + (key << 31);
00135 
00136         return key;
00137 }
